questions.questionText: When was Roger Federer born?
questions.info: Roger Federer was born on August 8, 1981 in Basel, Switzerland

questions.questionText: When was Novak Djokovic born?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic was born on May 22, 1987 in Belgrade, Serbia

questions.questionText: When was Rafael Nadal born?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic was born on June 3, 1986 in Manacor, Mallorca, Spain

questions.questionText: What year did Federer turn pro?
questions.info: Roger Federer made his debut on the ATP Tour in 1998.

questions.questionText: What year did Nadal turn pro?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal made his debut on the ATP Tour in 1998.

questions.questionText: What year did Federer turn pro?
questions.info: Roger Federer made his debut on the ATP Tour in 1998.

questions.questionText: What year did Nadal turn pro?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal made his debut on the ATP Tour in 1998.

questions.questionText: What year did Djokovic turn pro?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic made his debut on the ATP Tour in 2003.

questions.questionText: When did Federer win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Roger Federer won his first Grand Slam, Wimbledon, in 2003.

questions.questionText: When did Nadal win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal won Roland Garros, in 2005. He won on his first Roland Garros debut.

questions.questionText: When did Djokovic win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic won the Austrailian Open in 2008, becoming the first Serbian man to win a Grand Slam.

questions.questionText: When did Djokovic win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic won the Austrailian Open in 2008, becoming the first Serbian man to win a Grand Slam.

questions.questionText: What was the first year Federer was Number One in the world?
questions.info: Roger Federer took the Number One ranking for his first time in 2004.

questions.questionText: What was the first year Nadal was Number One in the world?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal took the Number One ranking for his first time in 2008.

questions.questionText: What was the first year Djokovic was Number One in the world?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic took the Number One ranking for his first time in 2011.

questions.questionText: How many years did Roger Federer finish the season Number One in the world?
questions.info: Roger Federer finished Number One in the world for 5 years.

questions.questionText: How many years did Rafael Nadal finish the season Number One in the world?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal finished Number One in the world for 5 years.

questions.questionText: How many years did Novak Djokovic finish the season Number One in the world?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic finished Number One in the world for 7 years.

questions.questionText: How old was Roger Federer when he won his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Roger Federer won his first Grand Slam at 21.

questions.questionText: How old was Rafael Nadal when he won his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal won his first Grand Slam at 24.

questions.questionText: How old was Novak Djokovic when he won his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic won his first Grand Slam at 20.

questions.questionText: How old was Roger Federer when he turned pro?
questions.info: Roger Federer turned pro at age 17, but he didn't have much success initially.

questions.questionText: How old was Rafael Nadal when he turned pro?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal turned pro at the young age of 15, but he didn't have much success initially.
